footer: © Math Graph Art Search by TETH_Main
how-to-use-title: How to Use the Formula Search Site
keyword-search-description: You can search by entering words found in formula titles, the formulas themselves, or formula types.
tag-search-description: Click on tags to search for formulas belonging to specific categories. Selecting multiple tags will display formulas that match all selected tags.
formula-type-search-description: Click on formula types to search for formulas of that specific type.
formula-card-description: Search results are displayed as formula cards. Each card includes the following information:
title: Title:
title-description: Name or description of the formula
formula-type-description: Classification of the formula (displayed in the top-right of the image)
formula-description: The formula in a copyable format
copy-formula-description: Click the copy button next to a formula to copy it to your clipboard.
copy-formula-instruction: Copied formulas can be pasted into editors or documents that support LaTeX.
basic-info-description: Enter the formula title, type, and related tags.
create-formula-description: Enter your formula in the Desmos graphing calculator to create a graph.
click-register-description: After entering all information, click the "Register" button. The formula and image will be automatically registered.
result-message-success: Upload successful! The formula has been registered.
no-results: No results found. Please change your search criteria.
